content: Landed in NYC with a head full of dreams and a heart still in Japan. The city that never sleeps feels like a stark contrast to the tranquility I've left behind. Wondering what adventures await in this concrete jungle.
Feeling the city pulse, I've started sketching again. The chaos of NYC somehow fuels my creativity. Maybe it's time to find a balance between work and personal passions.
Took a break from the grind to visit the Met. Got lost in the art, sketching some pieces. Realized I need more of this in my life. Time to make space for creativity amidst the chaos.
